import React, { Component } from "react" import axios from "axios" import { Helmet } from "react-helmet" import Footer from "./layouts/footer" import Navbar from "./layouts/navbar" function stripHtmlTags(str) { if (str === null || str === "") return false str = str.toString() return str.replace(/<[^>]*>/g, "") } class News extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { toggleMenu: false, koompi: [], smallworld: [] } } componentDidMount() { axios .get( "https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=https://medium.com/feed/koompi" ) .then((res) => { this.setState({ koompi: res.data.items }) }) axios .get( "https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=https://medium.com/feed/smallworldvc" ) .then((res) => { this.setState({ smallworld: res.data.items }) }) } render() { const { smallworld, koompi } = this.state return (
News and Events


Community Update

{smallworld.slice(0, 6).map((data) => { return (
{data.thumbnail.match(/[^/]+(jpg|png|gif|jpeg)$/) ? (
) : (
)}

{data.title}


{stripHtmlTags(`${data.content.substring(0, 110)}...`)}

{data.author}
) })}


KOOMPI News

{koompi.slice(0, 6).map((data) => { return (

{data.title}


{stripHtmlTags(`${data.content.substring(0, 110)}...`)}

{data.author}
) })}


) } } export default News
